Selected Product: Equity Take Out - 2nd Mortgage 

Client looking to pay off existing private mortgage and pay CRA owing.

Income: BFS as an electrician, income calculated per bank statements less expenses.

Credit Story: Solid credit score, some collections left over from when work was slower a few years ago. Recent lates earlier this year were from work contracts paying him later than expected. Looking to clear those all off now and fix his credit before going prime again next year.

Please contact sarah@bluepearlmortgage.ca for any questions, thanks!

• Client wants to get qualified for 500k in order to pay his CRA balances

• B1 is self employed b2 has job and self employed as well

notes.text:
Selected Product: 1 Year Fixed Residential
Looking for 1st mortgage
Client is adamant on getting lowest rate possible (6.49%-6.99%). We are ok to adjust fees to compensate a lower rate if needed. 

Purpose: Clients looking to consolidate debts.

Income: 
B1 Travis - income confirmed per LOE
B2 Amita - BFS accountant, income calculated per the average of her 2023/2024 T1 Generals
B3 Ravindra - average of 2023/2024 T1 Generals

Travis' wife - not coming on title, but $1400/m being used as contributory income (she earns higher, as confirmed by her paystub). 

Amita's mom also lives with them and pays $750/m ( not using this to debt service)  
True ratios are much lower. 

Credit Story: Scores are 642, 650 and 785. Solid repayment history, however, balances have accrued over the last few years due to family expenses, weddings, emergencies, etc. Looking to clear off as much of Travis' debts as possible to save him $1700/m. His parents will clear their debts on their own as they are BFS and have the capability to increase their income.

Exit: Refinance in 1 year with A-lender.

Please contact stephanie@bluepearlmortgage.ca for any questions, thanks!

Add Travis Kumar he submitted his own applicaton
We do not want this affecting our mortgage at 9828 123 street

attention: Robby
(This deal was run by past Robby, and he estimated a rate of 7.66%)

Selected Product: Standard Rate/Fee 1 Year Fixed

Purpose: Client is requesting funds to consolidate debts.

Income: B1 (Amita) is a BFS accountant, income calculated per the average of her 2023/2024 T1 Generals
B2 (Ravindra) is an owner of a construction firm, and income is confirmed through T1 General.
B3 (Travis) works full time, and his Letter of Employment and paystub are provided to confirm income.

Travis' wife - not coming on title, but $1400/m being used as contributory income (she earns higher, as confirmed by her paystub).

Amita's mom also lives with them and pays $750/m ( not using this to debt service)
Thus, True ratios are much lower.

Credit Story: Clients have decent scores of 642,  785, and 650. Solid repayment history, however, balances have accrued over the last few years due to family expenses, weddings, emergencies, etc. Looking to clear off as much of Travis' debts as possible to save him money.

Exit: Refinance in 1 year with an A-lender when their credit is stronger.

At 75% LTV, GDS and TDS are acceptable.
All ratios in line.

If you have any questions, please contact Stephanie at stephanie@bluepearlmortgage.ca or call 604.372.2764.
Thanks!

Selected Product: Raw Land

Selected Product: Residential 2nd Mortgage

Purpose: Client is requesting funds to consolidate all debts.

Income/Employment: Client is retired and earns mostly from OAS, CPP, and WCB for long term disability and maintenance. 

Credit Score: Client's credit score is 513 and is bruised due to high utilization and balances after health issues. By refinancing, we can consolidate debts for the client to improve cash flow, and also rebuild his credit.

Exit: Client is planning to sell the property in approximately 2 years.

At 41% LTV, GDS and TDS are acceptable range.

If you have any questions, please contact Stephanie at stephanie@bluepearlmortgage.ca or call 604.372.2764.
Thanks!
